Body:
Description: Dear Team,

The customer want's to block all the cut copy paste activity from all the browser , so we need your assitance here, so please setup call today and resolve this.

Regards,
Sai

What We've Learned Updated: 29-05 One of our POC customer, Chanderpur, would like to  to block all cut, copy, and paste activities from all browsers. 
We have requested all necessary information and troubleshoot the issue. in a remote session where we fix the issue, by informing them that "The Clipboard functionality applies only to con?dential content that is de?ned inside the Policy Denylists section for the Source Code tab, Prede?ned Content, Custom Content, or Regular Expressions."
Next Steps Updated: 29-05 Close the issue.
